content: **knitted jumper with round yoke and nordic pattern in drops sky the piece is worked top down sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no skip-118 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-300-350-350-400-450 g colour 08 lavender 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 01 white **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
